title: WEATHER FORECAST FOR 31 JANUARY 2026 Issued at 2.00 p.m. on 30 January 2026 Showers will occur at times in Northern, North-Central and Eastern provinces and in Matale and Nuwara-Eliya districts. Fairly heavy falls above 50 mm are likely at some places in Mullaitivu, Trincomalee, Polonnaruwa and Matale districts. Several spells of shower will occur in Uva and Northwestern provinces. Showers or thundershowers are likely at several places in other areas of the island after 2.00 p.m, and fairly heavy falls above 50 mm are likely at some places. Misty conditions can be expected at some places in Western, Sabaragamuwa and Central provinces and in Galle and Matara districts during the early hours of the morning. The general public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
